levels.description: Stops attacking; HP Ratio required to activate this unit's Talent is increased to <@ba.vup>{talent@hp_ratio:0%}</>, and the <$ba.protect>Sanctuary</> effect is increased to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale}</> times. Heals all allies within Attack Range for <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of this unit's ATK every second
